title: (x) german san serif / square sans for Reinhardt Kommunikation - Klavika {Hanno}
content:
Hi Guys,

does anyone know what font this is?  
Looks like Cachet, but the R and G are different?

Thanks in advance,

Ren√©

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100215101752im_/http:/typophile.com/files/baustelle_5176.gif)
author: ReneRutten

comments.content:
Yes, it's Klavika off course. I should have known that...  
Know the font, it's hard to remember all the names.

Thanks.
